settings.text:
We offer a variety of services for the corporate collectors through our sister company Art Interiors including curatorial advising, investment opportunities, positive collaboration with commercial designers and architects and installation of art. As your partner, we can leverage a broad network of professional connections to bring pieces to your attention that you might otherwise never see. 

​

In considering art for the workspace, your company can be "as hands on" you'd like visiting artist studios and commissioning specific works or "as hands off"  as you'd like trusting me bring the best options to you. We have over 20 years of sales experience and can easily work within budgets to tailor your work environment. With your help we will study your corporate identity and advise you visual art that reflects your principles and brand recognition. We have built a reputation for impeccable taste, a good eye and earnest business practices.
